channel.title: My First Drawing Using MS Paint
channel.description:
I say my first, it's my first semi-completed drawing. I've messed around on Paint before, but have never gotten this far.
Okay, what I've done here is drawn a simple character outline (According to a picture of my account on RuneScape2), then gradually filled it in with different colours. Originally, I wasn't confident and didn't want to mess up, so I spent around 20 hours on this, zooming in to specific body parts and using the smallest brush to fill in the area, varying my colours every so often to make the shading look decent.
This was my outcome:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/6553/pure4lifesarttz8.png[/img][/URL][/center]
I got into my mates house and we were playing Halo 3, eventually got bored as you do. So I got that image and started working on it some more. This was the result (I'd spent around 2-3 hours on this believe it or not):
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/6639/pure4lifesartmh2nv1.png[/img][/URL][/center]
It's incomplete, and yes I do mean that if I were to complete the drawing, I'd go over all of the parts that need to be re-shaded. My methods were alot more varied doing this one, whereas the first time I was really carefull and used the undo tool God knows how many times..
Rate or whatever, I don't mind. Just tell me what you think. Unfortunate that it has to be revolved around RuneScape2 I know, I apologize for that.

item.title: My First Drawing Using MS Paint
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I imagine I could draw a RS character if I wanted, but I’d need something as a base.

item.title: My First Drawing Using MS Paint
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:37, topic:163157”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=221774.msg1935070#msg1935070 date=1197847805]
Hmm, would you mind making another with some chosen items[I would like to see more of you’re work]

If they are you’re work, very very nice work.
If somewhat does look like you screenshotted a character and traced over it a bit though lol.
[/quote]

Uh I guess I could, I never spend time doing artistic things though, it’s boring and I just end up frustrated and sad.

ThAt0n36Uy, if you are suggesting those were made on MS Paint, then I would like to see the site in which you got them from (I’m not doubting they could’ve been made using Paint, I just want to see them and others if possible).[/quote]

Visit the graphics section on the RuneScape Community forums. They have tutorials for images like that.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Drawing Using MS Paint
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Okay, what I've done here is drawn a simple character outline (According to a picture of my account on RuneScape2), then gradually filled it in with different colours.

Here he says he drew an outline according to his runescape character, whether he drew it looking at the image or physically traced image or not doesn’t matter, he used a premade image and copied it.

[quote=“Exception, post:30, topic:163157”]This is like the videos I saw on youtube of people drawing Ferrari’s in Paint! Those pictures are amazing, I’ve never seen such good pixel art.
ThAtOn36Uy, am I misinterpreting your posts, or are you saying he took a screenshot of his RuneScape character, and traced it in paint? Because what your saying is bullshit.
10/10.[/quote]

Exception, I don’t see where you have the right to come in here and begin arguing in a fight that has nothing to do with you. He did use a premade image, he took a picture of his account.



I have to say, I agree with Goatee. There isn’t much skill in this picture.

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy, I spent alot of time on this picture, so I wouldn’t say I done ‘little’ although I agree it’s nothing special.
Monster Hack, thank you. Like I said, I’d messed around in Paint before so I had some experience.
Thanks Exe. Stop arguing guys, just post your comment on the picture and other’s comments, but keep it clean.
Cheers Fr33 mate. Thanks to Exception also.
goatee, I wasn’t going for a realistic look, considering it was immitating a picture from a game.

item.title: My First Drawing Using MS Paint
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Monster Hack, post:26, topic:163157”]ThAt0n36Uy can you just leave the topic? The kid was proud of what he made and you’re giving him shit because people liked it.
Compare your first image, using Photoshop and his, using MS Paint.

…Yeah…I think he won.

He didn’t use the bucket tool so that would have taken quite some time to do it using the pen tool.
You used a tutorial, and a few effects.
Stop being such a dick, leave now.

Nice job Br3ndan, much much much better then my first picture in Paint.

-Mh[/quote]

I really don’t see where you get off comparing my work to his, I didn’t follow a tutorial. I have every right to be in this topic as anybody else.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Drawing Using MS Paint
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:17, topic:163157”]…
Used the paint bucket? Do you have fucking eyes? The paint bucket in mspaint does not add shading and lighting. He even stated in his first post that he mostly used the “smallest brush to fill in the area, varying my colours every so often to make the shading look decent”.

10/10 for effort. 8.5/10 for quality. You could have done the grass better in the first picture ;)[/quote]

Actually, I wasn’t talking about the second one. I was talking about the first one (the one which took him 20 hours.), the one with the solid cyan background.

[quote=“spankjava, post:19, topic:163157”]…
So how did make runescape creat it if no one can physically draw something like that[/quote]

That has no gravity on the conversation at all you jack ass. He fucking traced a picture off of RuneScape. which already has a pretty large contour from character to background. He’s a kid, not a 20 year old professional game designer. Big deal Jagex made a character.

I never said no one could make images like that. I said he shouldn’t get the kind of praise he is getting for what little work he did.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Let me get home so I can trace a RuneScape picture. Honestly, when people physically draw something, like anime. People ask if you traced it or not, and you say “Oh, yeah, I did.” Then they make fun of you. Or just brush off what you drew as just a sheet of paper. Useless, now when a person traces a fricken picture, and uses a paint bucket. They get praise, it’s ridiculous.

So how did make runescape creat it if no one can physically draw something like that
